评论详情: I love oversized sweatshirts, but the latest style is for them to be all cropped. That’s great for being fashionable outside of the house, but just hanging out around I want full-size/length. The design is also great and had a few people asking me, “You went to Harvard?!”  Lol.....no.

Although this sweatshirt looks really good.  I would have liked to have it be a bit thicker.  The sizing runs a little small.  I got the 2X and it is actually XL.  Which works great when you have something underneath.
Great material quality and the graphic looks awesome!
